none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 14, 2012 Description from Terminal Escape:
From the ashes of (or at least the guitarist of ) Vancouver's UNLEARN comes SYSTEMATIK. Lighting speed hardcore with searing guitars and a vocalist that can actually manage to convey his live frustration through recorded media - a rare feat. Four tunes on this demo, blown to shit with the chaos reigned in just enough...unhinged intensity at its finest. Worth it for the solo in "World Of Misery" alone, this four song banger will give you exactly what you came here for. SYSTEMATIK
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-WUZoE_nb62k/T68-3ZcOavI/AAAAAAAACvc/Rn0DebhLvsE/s1600/systematik+copy.jpg http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2011/01/unlearn.html

seo.title: Systematik - Systematik demo 2012 - Terminal Escape
